definition: a short abrupt inclination, usually of the head, to cut hair in the style of a bob
details:
noun
- a short abrupt inclination, usually of the head
= example: a short abrupt inclination, usually of the head
- a short or shortened tail of certain animals
= synonyms: bobtail, dock
- a small float usually made of cork
= synonyms: bobber, cork, bobfloat
- a hanging weight, especially a metal ball on a string
- a long racing sled (for 2 or more people) with a steering mechanism
= synonyms: bobsled, bobsleigh
- a hair style for women and children
- a former monetary unit in Great Britain
= synonyms: shilling
verb
- to cut hair in the style of a bob
= example: to cut hair in the style of a bob
- to make a curtsy
= example: to make a curtsy
= synonyms: curtsy
- to remove or shorten the tail of an animal
= example: to remove or shorten the tail of an animal
= synonyms: tail, dock
- to move up and down repeatedly
= example: to move up and down repeatedly
= synonyms: bounce
- to ride a bobsled
= example: to ride a bobsled
= synonyms: bobsled
